detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract ZODI (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#463-659) has payable functions:
	 - ZODI.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#605-658)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [ZODI](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#L463-L659) has payable functions:
	 - [ZODI.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#L605-L658)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description:

ERC20Detailed.constructor(string,string,uint8).symbol (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#435) shadows:
	- ERC20Detailed.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#451-453) (function)

ERC20Detailed.constructor(string,string,uint8).decimals (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#435) shadows:
	- ERC20Detailed.decimals() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#458-460) (function)

ZODI.balanceOf(address).owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#490) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#89) (state variable)

ZODI._autoUnlock(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#580-590) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timelockList[holder][idx]._releaseTime <= now (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#582)
detectors.markdown:
[ZODI._autoUnlock(address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#L580-L590) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [timelockList[holder][idx]._releaseTime <= now](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#L582)

detectors.description:
ZODI.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#605-658) uses assembly
	- INLINE ASM (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#608-658)
Pragma version^0.5.0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZODI.sol#1) allows old versions
solc-0.5.0 is not recommended for deployment
